Howto add a WMSin !OpenAddresses

= Introduction =

This page describes howto add a WMS in !OpenAddresses

= Step by Step =

 1. Add a cascading WMS config in local !MapServer (http://code.google.com/p/openaddresses/source/browse/trunk/openaddresses/mapserver/cascading.map): 
{{{
 LAYER
  NAME "SITN_sitn"
  TYPE RASTER
  STATUS ON
  CONNECTION "http://sitn.ne.ch/ogc-sitn-open/wms?"
  CONNECTIONTYPE WMS
  METADATA
    "wms_srs"             "EPSG:4326"
    "wms_name"            "SITN"
    "wms_server_version"  "1.1.1"
    "wms_format"          "image/png"
  END
 END
}}}
 1. Fill information in http://code.google.com/p/openaddresses/wiki/LayerList
 1. Add layer in http://code.google.com/p/openaddresses/source/browse/trunk/openaddresses/openaddresses/public/app/js/OpenAddressesLayers.js
